Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's head coach Steve Clarke emphasized the mantra'respect everyone and fear no one' during a press conference on the eve of the match.
Coach Steve Clarke expressed confidence in the team's ability to perform well and achieve results, focusing on qualifying for the knockout stages.
Captain Andy Robertson highlighted the team's preparation and the support of the Tartan Army, stating they are ready to perform.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the opening game of the European Championship, setting the stage for the tournament.
Scotland has a historical advantage with a rare win over Germany in 1999.
The political and social context in Germany, especially post-World Cup 2006, adds complexity to the tournament atmosphere.
